body_html: my memory issue on linux/cpu is solved. however i am now seeing +90% (!) longer train times on windows with tf1.4 and cuda 8 on 1080ti. same issue with tf 1.5rc1 + cuda 9 + cudnn 7. would appreciate any help debugging this.
